content: paulie pumpkin is a quick and easy amigurumi pumpkin pattern that creates a cute and little crochet pumpkin that fits in the palm of your hand although i have used safety eyes and added facial details to my pumpkin you can omit those details and have a normal crochet pumpkin without a face paulie was designed to be a no-sew amigurumi so there are no pieces to sew onto the toy pattern includes a step-by-step video tutorial **printable ad-free pdf versions of the pattern are available in my ravelry shop or** **here** https //www etsy
